sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="vue-modal" v-show="open">
    <transition name="slide">
      <section class="vue-modal-inner">
        <section class="vue-modal-content">
          <slot />
          <button type="button" @click="$emit('close')">Close</button>
        </section>
      </section>
    </transition>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    props: {
      open: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: true,
      },
    },
  };
</script>
